# Government Tender Announcement

## Title

E60PH-24RSVA-A: RSV Vaccine for Older Adults

## Reference Number

WS4557941089-Doc4557970901

## Solicitation Number

WS4557941089

## Publication Date

April 29, 2024

## Tender Closing Date

May 22, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT

## Amendment Number

3

## Amendment Date

May 13, 2024

## Expected Contract Start Date

May 31, 2024

## Expected Contract End Date

None

## Tender Status

Expired

## Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada, is seeking proposals for the supply of Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) vaccine for older adults (60 years and older). The vaccine will be required on an as-and-when requested basis to various Federal, Provincial and Territorial participants from contract award to March 31, 2025.

## Tender Information
* **Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Various free trade agreements, including Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and others
* **Delivery Region**: Canada
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Contact**: Daphné Ouimet, daphne.ouimet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
